Data.Title: Metatrader 5
Data.Title2: Get access to platforms where you can invest in the fastest way.
Data.ShortDesc:
MetaTrader 4 is a popular Forex trading and analysis platform that provides trading currencies, stocks, precious metals and CFDs in stock indices. In this section, KALE FX customers can download the MetaTrader 4 trading platform and mobile applications for PDA, iPhone, iPad and Android.

  • ALL PLATFORMS WITH ONE PASSWORD
  • EASY AND FAST FINANCIAL OPERATIONS
  • FREE FOREX SIGNALS
  • DOUBLE DIRECTLY INVESTMENT
  • SENT AND OPEN POSITION FOLLOW
Data.LongDesc:
• Platform Features
  • One password on all platforms
  • Order and Open Position tracking
  • Display limit and collateral information
  • Technical analysis and charts with Tradingview
  • Sending orders via graphics
  • One-click order submission
  • Ticket or list view, submit order via list
  • More than 40 parity, gold, commodity and CFD investment
  • System requirements
  • PROCESSORİ5 AND OVER
  • INTERNET CONNECTION4 MB AND OVER
  • SCREEN RESOLUTION1920X1080 (RECOMMENDED)
  • RAM4 GB AND OVER
  • OPERATING SYSTEMSWINDOWS 7 AND OVER, MAC OS
  • WEB BROWSERALL BROWSER (OVER CHROME)
Data.SeoDesc: Metatrader 5 is at your service with the assurance of  KaleFx where you can get instant access to all platforms in the fastest way!
